verses.verse: Thou also, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, take <WH3947> thee a tile <WH3843>, and lay <WH5414> it before <WH6440> thee, and pourtray <WH2710> upon it the city <WH5892>, even Jerusalem <WH3389>:

And lay <WH5414> siege <WH4692> against it, and build <WH1129> a fort <WH1785> against it, and cast <WH8210> a mount <WH5550> against it; set <WH5414> the camp <WH4264> also against it, and set <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against it round about <WH5439>. battering: chief leaders

Moreover take <WH3947> thou unto thee an iron <WH1270> pan <WH4227>, and set <WH5414> it for a wall <WH7023> of iron <WH1270> between thee and the city <WH5892>: and set <WH3559> thy face <WH6440> against it, and it shall be besieged <WH4692>, and thou shalt lay siege <WH6696> against it. This shall be a sign <WH226> to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>. an: or, a flat plate, or, slice

Lie <WH7901> thou also upon thy left <WH8042> side <WH6654>, and lay <WH7760> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> upon it: according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> that thou shalt lie <WH7901> upon it thou shalt bear <WH5375> their iniquity <WH5771>.

For I have laid <WH5414> upon thee the years <WH8141> of their iniquity <WH5771>, according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117>, three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117>: so shalt thou bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

And when thou hast accomplished <WH3615> them <WH428>, lie <WH7901> again <WH8145> on thy right <WH3233> <WH3227> side <WH6654>, and thou shalt bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> forty <WH705> days <WH3117>: I have appointed <WH5414> thee each day <WH3117> <WH3117> for a year <WH8141> <WH8141>. each: Heb. a day for a year, a day for a year
Therefore thou shalt set <WH3559> thy face <WH6440> toward the siege <WH4692> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and thine arm <WH2220> shall be uncovered <WH2834>, and thou shalt prophesy <WH5012> against it.

And, behold, I will lay <WH5414> bands <WH5688> upon thee, and thou shalt not turn <WH2015> thee from one side <WH6654> to another <WH6654>, till thou hast ended <WH3615> the days <WH3117> of thy siege <WH4692>. from one: Heb. from thy side to thy side

Take <WH3947> thou also unto thee wheat <WH2406>, and barley <WH8184>, and beans <WH6321>, and lentiles <WH5742>, and millet <WH1764>, and fitches <WH3698>, and put <WH5414> them in one <WH259> vessel <WH3627>, and make <WH6213> thee bread <WH3899> thereof, according to the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> that thou shalt lie <WH7901> upon thy side <WH6654>, three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117> shalt thou eat <WH398> thereof. fitches: or, spelt
And thy meat <WH3978> which thou shalt eat <WH398> shall be by weight <WH4946>, twenty <WH6242> shekels <WH8255> a day <WH3117>: from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> shalt thou eat <WH398> it.
Thou shalt drink <WH8354> also water <WH4325> by measure <WH4884>, the sixth part <WH8345> of an hin <WH1969>: from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> shalt thou drink <WH8354>.
And thou shalt eat <WH398> it as barley <WH8184> cakes <WH5692>, and thou shalt bake <WH5746> it with dung <WH1561> that cometh out <WH6627> of man <WH120>, in their sight <WH5869>.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559>, Even thus shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> eat <WH398> their defiled <WH2931> bread <WH3899> among the Gentiles <WH1471>, whither I will drive <WH5080> them.

Then said <WH559> I, Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>! behold, my soul <WH5315> hath not been polluted <WH2930>: for from my youth <WH5271> up even till now have I not eaten <WH398> of that which dieth of itself <WH5038>, or is torn in pieces <WH2966>; neither came <WH935> there abominable <WH6292> flesh <WH1320> into my mouth <WH6310>.

Then he said <WH559> unto me, Lo <WH7200>, I have given <WH5414> thee cow's <WH1241> dung <WH6832> <WH6832> for man's <WH120> dung <WH1561>, and thou shalt prepare <WH6213> thy bread <WH3899> therewith.

Moreover he said <WH559> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, behold, I will break <WH7665> the staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899> in Jerusalem <WH3389>: and they shall eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> by weight <WH4948>, and with care <WH1674>; and they shall drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> by measure <WH4884>, and with astonishment <WH8078>:
That they may want <WH2637> bread <WH3899> and water <WH4325>, and be astonied <WH8074> one <WH376> with another <WH251>, and consume away <WH4743> for their iniquity <WH5771>.
